title: "How To Keep Our AI Obsession From Overcomplicating Data Projects"
excerpt: "To work effectively, AI needs to be used in the right way for the right applications. You wouldn't use a precision laser to tailor clothing. It could work, but it would create unnecessary cost and risk with no meaningful improvement over fabric scissors."
